CustomField.description: This field is optional and auto-populates based on the Collateral type. It is the percentage of the value of Collateral that a lender uses to determine the amount of a loan.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The percentage of the value of collateral that a lender uses to determine the amount of a loan. This is a calculated field from the Collateral Type.
CustomField.label: Advance Rate
